== Software Freedom Day 2009 ==
=== What!? ===
Software Freedom Day is a day where people <nowiki>[[http://cgi.softwarefreedomday.org/2009/map.shtml|all over the world]]</nowiki> come together to:
# Celebrate software freedom and the people behind it.
# Foster a general understanding of software freedom, and encourage adoption of free software and open standards.
# Create more equal access to opportunities through the use of participatory technologies.
# Promote constructive dialogue on responsibilities and rights in the information society.
# Be inclusive of organizations and individuals that share our Vision.
# Be pragmatic, transparent, and responsible as an organisation.

But what can we actually do to get these goals to be achieved? We are going to have a meeting in <nowiki>[[WelshTeam-IRC|IRC]]</nowiki> to discuss our actual methods however there are some predefined ones which we will take interest in <nowiki>[[http://softwarefreedomday.org/StartGuide#head-19767507175880cf43c7f07f73aaa548f63d0a90|here]]</nowiki>.

=== When ===
SFD 2009 will take place on 19th September 2009.

=== Where ===
To be discussed in a future IRC meeting.
